Key Match Events: The Thunder were fighting an uphill battle against the Cavaliers, who were two-and-a-half-point underdogs.
The game was close, with neither team leading by more than a few points, and it ended with a tied score at the end of the fourth quarter before the Cavaliers pulled away.
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed pride in the team's effort despite the loss.
The loss was an explainable one given the circumstances, including injuries to key players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was tied eight times.
Cleveland's zone defense in the final frame was effective.
